short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds DeBank profile link on Etherscan and other popular EVM scan transaction pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We usually analyse wallet activity and performance using DeBank transaction history. 
This extension puts a link to DeBank profile when you check the address profile or transaction in Etherscan, BscScan, Arbiscan and other EVM network scans, so you can check the profile in DeBank instantly.
